bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of shrivelling dry skin and muscles/flesh losing their functions. Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 Substance Entry chi xiao dou 赤小豆：小豆性逐津液，久服令人 枯燥矣 , “The nature of soybeans is to expel liquids. If consumed for long it will make people appear with ered and dry ”.

②Appearance of items that have lost their liquid elements. Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 Substance Entry zhi mu 知母：葉至難死，掘出隨生，須枯燥乃止 , “The leaves do not easily die. If plucked they still live. Only if they have been made to wither and dry , do they stop further growth”.
